page.title: 16An 8 year old girl's day. p1
page.content: Every day except at weekends I get up around 7 o'clock. I get dressed before I go down to breakfast. We have a choice of three or four cereals or toast. When I have finished breakfast I wash my teeth and brush my hair. At half past eight Nia's mother comes down and picks me up to take me to school. Before school starts we have assembly. We do maths first then either reading or English. At quarter to eleven we have playtime except on Tuesdays when we have it at twenty to eleven because we have a television programme called Watch. We have dinner at 12 o'clock, you can either bring a packed lunch or have dinners, it costs 60p a meal. After dinner we have Welsh and the Top Infants come into our class to make room for the Nursery class which is the four year olds.
